help-file.title: MYSTICS
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all available help that deals with the spellcasting abilities of Duris's characters. Type "help <entry>" for more information.
Example: "help cast" will bring up an explanation of CAST and how it used.
CAST CHANT SONG INSTRUMENTS MUSIC MAGIC MEMORIZE PRAY FORGET PLAY PRACTICE QUAFF POTIONS RECITE SCROLLS SCRIBE USE WAND STAFFS
